016package de.cuioss.uimodel.nameprovider;
017
018import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
019
020import java.text.MessageFormat;
021import java.util.MissingResourceException;
022import java.util.ResourceBundle;
023
024import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
025import lombok.ToString;
026
027/**
028 * DisplayMessageProvider provide {@linkplain DisplayMessageFormat} to be able
029 * to transport key and arguments which can be used for
030 * {@linkplain java.text.MessageFormat}
031 *
032 * @author Eugen Fischer
033 */
034@ToString
035@EqualsAndHashCode
036public class DisplayMessageProvider implements IDisplayNameProvider<DisplayMessageFormat> {
037
038    private static final long serialVersionUID = -3453598477657055961L;
039
040    private final DisplayMessageFormat content;
041
042    /**
043     * Create DisplayMessageProvider
044     *
045     * @param displayMessageFormat {@linkplain DisplayMessageFormat} must not be
046     *                             {@code null}
047     */
048    public DisplayMessageProvider(final DisplayMessageFormat displayMessageFormat) {
049        content = requireNonNull(displayMessageFormat, "displayMessageFormat");
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public DisplayMessageFormat getContent() {
054        return content;
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * @param bundle {@linkplain ResourceBundle} must not be {@code null}
059     * @return formated text
060     * @throws MissingResourceException if no object for the given key can be found
061     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if bundle is null, or if the pattern is
062     *                                  invalid, or if an argument in the arguments
063     *                                  array is not of the type expected by the
064     *                                  format element(s) that use it.
065     */
066    public String getMessageFormated(final ResourceBundle bundle) {
067
068        requireNonNull(bundle, "bundle");
069        return MessageFormat.format(bundle.getString(content.getMsgKey()),
070                content.getArguments().toArray(new Object[content.getArguments().size()]));
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Provide creation of full initialized DisplayMessageProvider
075     *
076     * @author Eugen Fischer
077     */
078    public static class Builder {
079
080        /**
081         * @param messageKey must not be {@code null} or empty
082         * @return DisplayMessageFormat builder
083         */
084        public de.cuioss.uimodel.nameprovider.DisplayMessageFormat.Builder messageKey(final String messageKey) {
085            return new DisplayMessageFormat.Builder(messageKey);
086        }
087    }
088}
